keyMappings:
# Store: https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/vimium/dbepggeogbaibhgnhhndojpepiihcmeb?hl=ja
# Repo: https://github.com/philc/vimium
# Wiki: https://github.com/philc/vimium/wiki

map j scrollPageDown
map k scrollPageUp
map <C-f> scrollFullPageDown
map <C-b> scrollFullPageUp
map i focusInput
map I enterInsertMode
map t Vomnibar.activateTabSelection
map u goBack
map <C-r> goForward
map <C-j> scrollLeft
map <C-k> scrollRight
map h previousTab
map l nextTab
map <C-p> togglePinTab


# Disable reload
unmap r
# Disable open clipboard URL
unmap p
# Disable open clipboard URL in new tab
unmap P
# enterInsertMode is mapped to I
unmap gi
# unpin is mapped to <C-p>
unmap <A-p>
